name: Unity-VR-Dev
tagline: Homepage for the Unity VR Dev #Slack community
body:
### About us

[Unity VR Dev](unity-vr-dev.slack.com) is a friendly Slack community VR / AR enthusiasts and professionals, designing and developing using Unity3D.
We share our experience, skills, knowledge, and relevant news about VR, AR, and Unity3d.

### Code of conduct

We strongly encourage politeness, honesty, and professionalism.
We do not tolerate flood, spam, harassment, and other nonsense. 
Those who violate the rules will be subject to being expelled from the community.

### Get an invite

If you want to join our community, please use [this](http://goo.gl/forms/4AGJKiVnENxdYnyj2) form to request an invitation.

### Have a question?

If you have a question or suggestion feel free to use [this](http://goo.gl/forms/biZEcw9cWSNA7zx73) feedback form.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
